translation: There, in the body of the God of gods, Arjuna then saw the entire universe resting in one, with its myriad of divisions.
commentary: 11.13 There there? resting in one? Jagat the universe? the whole the whole? divided divided? in many ways in many groups? Did he see saw? Devadevasya of the God of gods? in the body in the body? Pandu: son of Pandu? Then then.Commentary Tatra There -- in the Cosmic Form.Anekadha Many groups -- gods? manes? men and other species of beings.Arjuna regards all forms as the forms of the Lord? all heads as His
